casebody.data:
Murray
v.
University of NC at Chapel Hill 124A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 16, 2016

Laura H. McHenry, Assistant Attorney General, Kimberly D. Potter, Special Deputy Attorney General, For University of North Carolina At Chapel Hill.

Henry Clay Turner, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, For Murray, Jillian.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 14th of June 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of June 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 9th day of August 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
